actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to reduce food stamp fraud and improve the food stamp program through the elimination of food stamp coupons and the use of electronic benefits transfer systems, and for other purposes.
short_title: Food Stamp Fraud Reduction Act of 1995
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Food Stamp Fraud Reduction Act of 1995 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to encourage and assist States to replace food stamp program coupons with an electronic benefits transfer (EBT) system. Sets forth EBT administrative and operating provisions, including: (1) phase-in periods and alternative transactions; (2) equipment assistance for food stores; (3) fees; (4) enforcement; (5) an EBT conversion fund; and (6) coordination with industry and States.

titles.title: Food Stamp Fraud Reduction Act of 1995

A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to reduce food stamp fraud and improve the food stamp program through the elimination of food stamp coupons and the use of electronic benefits transfer systems, and for other purposes.
